// import lifeImage from '../../image/Life.jpeg' import EditDelete from '../icons /EditDelete' import { SinglePost, SinglePostTitle, SinglePostInfo, Span, Name, SinglePostDescription, } from './Singlepost.styled' import { info } from '../post/PostInfo' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import Sidebar from '../sidebar/Sidebar' const SinglePostCard = () => { let { id } = useParams() console.log(id) const filterPosts = info.find((el) => el.id === parseInt(id)) return ( <>
{filterPosts.title} Author: Dohee Lee {filterPosts.postDate} {filterPosts.description}
) } export default SinglePostCard
